Weekly rates and water now $100 for avg. household in Auckland Council’s 10-year Budget https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/100-the-new-weekly-cost-of-rates-and-water-bills-for-auckland-households/KNL5D2ZWIVHNFIYDIAMGKKM3JU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/100-the-new-weekly-cost-of-rates-and-water-bills-for-auckland-households/KNL5D2ZWIVHNFIYDIAMGKKM3JU/ Bernard OrsmanDoing nothing is changing nothing, says Independent Maori Statutory Board member. Photo / Michael Craig

Auckland business cleans up after nearly 2000 used tyres illegally dumped on doorstep https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-business-cleans-up-after-nearly-2000-used-tyres-illegally-dumped-on-doorstep/RPDQBWZKMZDBFARVVMMSAJ2B24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-business-cleans-up-after-nearly-2000-used-tyres-illegally-dumped-on-doorstep/RPDQBWZKMZDBFARVVMMSAJ2B24/ The owner said Auckland Council won't help because the tyres are on private property. Concern Commerce Commission job cuts will impact services; changes revealed through leaked document https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ Azaria HowellThe Herald has seen an employees-only document from the commission, outlining the changes.
